sense.def: Etiological Agent. Pathological Condition identical with gu du 蠱毒 , gu poison . Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry jiao yu pi 鮫魚皮：主 蠱氣，蠱疰方用之 , “It controls gu -qi ; in recipes for gu -attachment-illness one makes use of it”. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry chun 蓴：解百藥毒並蠱氣 , “It dissolves all types of pharmaceutical poisons and also gu- qi ”.
